Fence.summary: NOTE Experimental The Fence interface of the {{domxref("Fenced Frame API", "Fenced Frame API", "", "nocode")}} contains several functions relevant to fencedframe functionality.

remarks.para: Fence objects are accessed through the property, but they are only available to documents embedded inside {{htmlelement("fencedframe")}}s (loaded via s) or {{htmlelement("iframe")}}s (loaded via opaque URNs).

blockquote.para: See How do <fencedframe>s work? for some description around FencedFrameConfigs and opaque URNs.

remarks.para:
-Fenced frames on privacysandbox.google.com
-The Privacy Sandbox on privacysandbox.google.com

FenceGetNestedConfigs.summary:
NOTE Experimental The getNestedConfigs() method of the
interface returns the s loaded into <fencedframe>s embedded inside the current <fencedframe>.

remarks.para:
-Fenced frames on privacysandbox.google.com
-The Privacy Sandbox on privacysandbox.google.com

FenceGetNestedConfigs.returns: getNestedConfigs() has two possible return values:

FenceReportEvent.summary:
NOTE Experimental The reportEvent() method of the
interface triggers the submission of report data via a beacon to one or more specific URLs registered via the method of the Protected Audience API, for the purpose of collecting ad auction results.

blockquote.para: provides similar report data submission, except in that case the submission is triggered via a navigation rather than by an explicit method call.

remarks.para:
-Fenced frames on privacysandbox.google.com
-The Privacy Sandbox on privacysandbox.google.com

FenceSetReportEventDataForAutomaticBeaco.summary:
NOTE Experimental The setReportEventDataForAutomaticBeacons() method of the
interface specifies event data that will be sent when a navigation occurs inside a {{htmlelement("fencedframe")}}. This data will be sent via an automatic beacon to one or more specific URLs registered via the method of the Protected Audience API, for the purpose of collecting reporting data for ad auction results.

blockquote.para: provides similar report data submission, except in that case the submission is triggered via an explicit method call rather than a navigation.

remarks.para:
-Fenced frames on privacysandbox.google.com
-The Privacy Sandbox on privacysandbox.google.com
